name: JINDARAT
greetingText: I am glad to meet the most beautiful you in the most beautiful time
wishText: 朱颜长似，头上花枝，岁岁年年。愿君青丝不老，岁岁皆欢。
textInChatBox: Very, VERY, VERY sincere WISH YOU HAPPY BIRTHDAY!! Lots and lots of happiness...
text2: I want to give you a surprise
text3: I thought long and hard about it
text4: We are not far apart, but we are in two countries
text4Adjective: I made this animation to wish you a happy birthday
wishHeading: 生日快乐啊!，Happy Birthday!，สุขสันต์วันเกิด
outroText: I hope you enjoyed this little surprise!!
replayText: If you like, you can watch it again!
